flawed_nl_solution:
At a germination rate of 3/5, 25 seeds will yield 3/5*25=<<3/5*25=51>>51 plants.
At a germination rate of 4/5, 25 seeds will yield 4/5*25=<<4/5*25=20>>20 plants.
In total, she will have grown 51+20=<<51+20=71>>71 plants.
If 4/5 of the plants developed flowers, then she will have grown (4/5)*71=<<(4/5)*71=284/5>>284/5 plants that produce flowers.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
